org.beancp

Interface Map<S,D>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - source class
    D - destination class

    public interface Map<S,D>
    Map configuration. Interface methods must be executed in following order:
    1. constructDestinationObjectUsing(java.util.function.Supplier) zero or one time
    2. beforeMap(org.beancp.Action) zero or many times
    3. useConvention(org.beancp.MapConvention) zero or one time
    4. bind(java.util.function.Supplier, java.util.function.Consumer, org.beancp.BindingOption...), bindConstant(java.lang.Object, java.util.function.Consumer, org.beancp.BindingOption...), mapInner(java.util.function.Supplier, java.util.function.Consumer, java.lang.Class, org.beancp.BindingOption[]) and mapInner(java.util.function.Supplier, java.util.function.Consumer, java.util.function.Supplier, java.lang.Class, org.beancp.BindingOption[]) methods zero or many times in any order
    5. afterMap(org.beancp.Action) zero or many times

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<S,D> afterMap(Action action)
      Action to be performed before mappings.

      Action to be performed after mappings.

      Adds calculated member binding to destination member or members.
      <T> Map<S,D> bindConstant(T constantValue, java.util.function.Consumer<T> toMember, BindingOption<S,D,T>... options)
      Adds constant binding to destination member or members.
      Map<S,D> constructDestinationObjectUsing(java.util.function.Supplier<D> destinationObjectBuilder)
      Operation used to build destination object.
      <SI,DI> Map<S,D> mapInner(java.util.function.Supplier<SI> fromFunction, java.util.function.Consumer<DI> toMember, Class<DI> toMemberClass, BindingOption<S,D,DI>... options)
      Adds inner object mapping.
      <SI,DI> Map<S,D> mapInner(java.util.function.Supplier<SI> fromFunction, java.util.function.Consumer<DI> toMember, java.util.function.Supplier<DI> toMemberGetter, Class<DI> toMemberClass, BindingOption<S,D,DI>... options)
      Adds inner object mapping.
      Map<S,D> useConvention(MapConvention MapConvention)
      Adds mappings using convention.

    • Method Detail

      • constructDestinationObjectUsing

        Map<S,D> constructDestinationObjectUsing(java.util.function.Supplier<D> destinationObjectBuilder)
        Operation used to build destination object.
        Parameters:
        destinationObjectBuilder - destination object builder, must be thread-safe.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

      • beforeMap

        Map<S,D> beforeMap(Action action)
        Action to be performed after mappings.
        Parameters:
        action - action to be executed after mappings, must be thread-safe.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

      • useConvention

        Map<S,D> useConvention(MapConvention MapConvention)
        Adds mappings using convention. Convention mappings are performed before other mappings defined by bind(java.util.function.Supplier, java.util.function.Consumer, org.beancp.BindingOption...) and bindConstant(java.lang.Object, java.util.function.Consumer, org.beancp.BindingOption...).
        Parameters:
        MapConvention - convention to use.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

      • bind

        <T> Map<S,D> bind(java.util.function.Supplier<T> fromFunction,
                  java.util.function.Consumer<T> toMember,
                  BindingOption<S,D,T>... options)
        Adds calculated member binding to destination member or members.
        Type Parameters:
        T - value data type
        Parameters:
        fromFunction - calculated member function, must be thread-safe.
        toMember - destination class member, must be thread-safe.
        options - additional mapping options
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

      • bindConstant

        <T> Map<S,D> bindConstant(T constantValue,
                          java.util.function.Consumer<T> toMember,
                          BindingOption<S,D,T>... options)
        Adds constant binding to destination member or members.
        Type Parameters:
        T - value data type
        Parameters:
        constantValue - constant value
        toMember - destination class member, must be thread-safe.
        options - additional mapping options
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

      • mapInner

        <SI,DI> Map<S,D> mapInner(java.util.function.Supplier<SI> fromFunction,
                          java.util.function.Consumer<DI> toMember,
                          java.util.function.Supplier<DI> toMemberGetter,
                          Class<DI> toMemberClass,
                          BindingOption<S,D,DI>... options)
        Adds inner object mapping.
        Type Parameters:
        SI - source value data type
        DI - destination value data type
        Parameters:
        fromFunction - calculated member function, must be thread-safe.
        toMember - destination class member setter, must be thread-safe.
        toMemberGetter - destination class member get, must be thread-safe.
        toMemberClass - destination class member type
        options - additional mapping options
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

      • mapInner

        <SI,DI> Map<S,D> mapInner(java.util.function.Supplier<SI> fromFunction,

        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)
